::Lavatron::

Lavatron feels the electricity surge through him, but since he was in
lightning mode, he uses the electricity to fire at Rampage. He brings
his leg back, snapping it forward to launch a good healthy kick at
Tantrum.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Tantrum Barely dodges the blasts, as they send him flying back. He
> transforms, and lands on his feet in Bull mode, and charges towards
the leg
> of Lavatron, hoping to gore him, and blasting electricity out of
them as he
> goes.
